name: Unicorn Attack
description:
Yes, this is game where you can choose 1 of 4 unicorns to fight each other, in a local multiplayer for 4 (exclusively 4) people!

Fire blasts of rainbow-colored projectiles at your rivals, pick-up some power-ups to grow your power (or not) and be the first on ranking to win!

Instructions:

See the instructions document inside the game's folder for more detailed instructions.

Being a prototype, we decided to limit the controllers to work as we expect, so:
P1 - Move with the keyboard arrows, select menu with X and shoots in game with Z.

P2 - Move with "4, 6, 8, 5" in numpad pick the player in selection screen with K and shoots in game with J

P3 and P4 - Just work with joystick. Left analog to move, X or A to pick the player in selection screen and shoots in game with SQUARE or X.

Joysticks supported: XBox 360, XBox One, Ps3 and PC Joysticks.
